text: That wouldn’t be a bad idea. But mainly for situations where anyone makes a module on a page and it needs to be transferred to another page. Or for the initial stages of a web build when I am building out modules on a dummy page then port them to the real page.
For HubDB, will we ever get the ability to have the HubSpot forms submit data to a table?
without using the api at the moment
I think they’ll have to have private hubDBs and only alow it on those. HubDBs are public so they dont want to accidentally allow people to make people’s personally identifiable stuff public’
Thats a good point! My thought behind it was for data entry for updating tables, didnt think of that.
I remember months ago a few of us brought up alternate UIs for data entry into HS. Some devs said they'd talk about it internally guessing it died there
